General.Name: Beijing Lier High Temperature Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells industrial refractories for the iron and steel, nonferrous metals, petrochemicals, and building materials in China and internationally. The company offers ironmaking system, electric furnace system, converter steelmaking system, steel refining system, ladle system, tundish system, and industrial furnace system refractories, as well as blast furnace gunning material and remote control gunning technology, refractories for cement kilns, and refractory fiber and fiber products. Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.
